details:
It was discovered that there was an information disclosure
vulnerability in zookeeper, a distributed co-ordination server.


* [CVE-2019-0201](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2019-0201)
Users who were not authorised to read data were able to view the access control list.


For Debian 8 Jessie, these problems have been fixed in version
3.4.9-3+deb8u2.


We recommend that you upgrade your zookeeper packages.


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
